sentinel.led
Class RuleThread

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--java.lang.Thread
        |
        +--sentinel.led.RuleThread
class RuleThread
extends java.lang.Thread

The RuleThread class is used to represent the thread that is created for executing a rule. Each rule is executed in a separate thread when it is scheduled by the rule scheduler. The name of the thread is the rule name itself.
